programme.title: Rise of the Zombies
Inwazja zombie
Rise of the Zombies
programme.desc:
Rise of the Zombies: Directed by Nick Lyon. With Mariel Hemingway, Ethan Suplee, LeVar Burton, Danny Trejo. When zombies overrun San Francisco, a desperate group survives by locking themselves inside Alcatraz Prison. When the undead breach the island, our heroes are forced to return to the mainland overrun with the undead." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2236182/","name":"Rise of the Zombies","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTc2OTM0MTE3NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTA2MzA1MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When zombies overrun San Francisco, a desperate group survives by locking themselves inside Alcatraz Prison. When the undead breach the island, our heroes are forced to return to the mainland overrun with the undead.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2236182/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nickelsdimes2077"},"dateCreated":"2013-03-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Worth watching ... for free","reviewBody":"The plot isn't anything new. And the execution is pretty typical. 

Mariel Hemmingway's acting was outright painful. Flat line delivery, and almost never with the proper emotion. Ethan Suplee isn't much better, but thankfully he doesn't have to say much. Lavar Burton is excellent, think the emotion of I Am Legend, without the kick-ass survivalist skills. By far the most noteworthy part of the movie. Danny Trejo is as Danny Trejo is, bad-ass. You won't be disappointed by him.

The effects are decent and the gore is quality. 

If you enjoy watching formulaic zombie action movies with little cinematic value, this will deliver.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3137,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-10-27","keywords":"zombie,alcatraz,scientist,mockbuster,san francisco bay","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Rise of the Zombies","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1530837529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODlmMzY3ZWYtYWNmMy00NTY1LWJjODYtOTdjZWE1NGE5MjYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODlmMzY3ZWYtYWNmMy00NTY1LWJjODYtOTdjZWE1NGE5MjYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Rise of the Zombies"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000446/","name":"Mariel Hemingway"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0839486/","name":"Ethan Suplee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000996/","name":"LeVar Burton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0528963/","name":"Nick Lyon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042909/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0019969/","name":"Keith Allan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3226880/","name":"Delondra Mesa"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

Dark Storm
programme.desc:
Dark Storm: Directed by Jason Bourque. With Stephen Baldwin, Rob LaBelle, Gardiner Millar, Camille Sullivan. Racing against time and greedy weapons dealers, a group of scientists led by Dr Gray must stop the Dark Matter discovery they made from destroying the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0758740/","name":"Dark Storm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTJjZWJiMmUtNzRiMS00MmRlLWFlMjItNmMzNzI1ODgwZGI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Racing against time and greedy weapons dealers, a group of scientists led by Dr Gray must stop the Dark Matter discovery they made from destroying the world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0758740/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"themoge"},"dateCreated":"2008-06-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Awful, just awful","reviewBody":"I had to stay up with my young son last night and thought Dark Storm looked vaguely interesting compared to the other pap on offer. 

No. 

It was the aura of car crash TV that kept me watching. A fat Stephen Baldwin acting worse than my armchair does. My word, I've never seen anyone so bad in a film. 

His scientist sidekick and the villain at least were professional and I could believe they were actors, but Mr. Baldwin gave the standout worst "acting performance" I have ever had the misfortune of sitting in front of. Whatever you do, do not waste an hour or two of your precious life on this utter shower of *&^%. Spend the time more fruitfully in staring at a blank wall, or cutting your toenails.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":898,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2006-06-15","keywords":"seattle space needle,disaster film,disaster movie,scientist,dark matter","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Dark Storm","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3231711513","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjFkZjRmYzYtOTBmZC00MzZmLWJlZDgtZTllMGExNmQzNzJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjFkZjRmYzYtOTBmZC00MzZmLWJlZDgtZTllMGExNmQzNzJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Lionsgate"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000286/","name":"Stephen Baldwin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005588/","name":"Rob LaBelle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0587667/","name":"Gardiner Millar"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1028302/","name":"Jason Bourque"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086887/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2180212/","name":"Sean Malcolm"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0773732/","name":"Brett Schneider"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2185370/","name":"John Cherfer"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

Racing against time and greedy weapons dealers, a group of scientists led by Dr Gray must stop the Dark Matter discovery they made from destroying the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0758740/","name":"Dark Storm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTJjZWJiMmUtNzRiMS00MmRlLWFlMjItNmMzNzI1ODgwZGI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Racing against time and greedy weapons dealers, a group of scientists led by Dr Gray must stop the Dark Matter discovery they made from destroying the world.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0758740/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"themoge","dateCreated":"2008-06-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Awful, just awful","reviewBody":"I had to stay up with my young son last night and thought Dark Storm looked vaguely interesting compared to the other pap on offer. 

No. 

It was the aura of car crash TV that kept me watching. A fat Stephen Baldwin acting worse than my armchair does. My word, I've never seen anyone so bad in a film. 

His scientist sidekick and the villain at least were professional and I could believe they were actors, but Mr. Baldwin gave the standout worst "acting performance" I have ever had the misfortune of sitting in front of. Whatever you do, do not waste an hour or two of your precious life on this utter shower of *&^%. programme.title: The Beautiful Country
Kraina szczęścia
The Beautiful Country
programme.desc: The Beautiful Country: Directed by Hans Petter Moland. With Damien Nguyen, Bai Ling, Thi Hoa Mai, Nick Nolte. After reuniting with his mother in Ho Chi Minh City, a family tragedy causes Binh to flee from Viet Nam to America. Landing in New York, Binh begins a road trip to Texas, where his American father is said to live." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0273108/","name":"The Beautiful Country","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWEwNTI4YzAtOWI0NS00ZGE0LWI4NTAtMDdhNzZkODBiNGM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"After reuniting with his mother in Ho Chi Minh City, a family tragedy causes Binh to flee from Viet Nam to America. Landing in New York, Binh begins a road trip to Texas, where his American father is said to live.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0273108/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jdpyke"},"dateCreated":"2005-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie, yet underrated","reviewBody":"Classic tale of redemption, brimming with drama and a lead character that says little, but who you quickly relate to and associate yourself with. Starts of kind of slow, but after 15-20 minutes, the movie picks up and never slows down, with high drama and classic storytelling. A must-see. The movie is set to the backdrop of the aftermath of the Vietnam war in Vietnam, and portrays the poverty-stricken environment they are forced to live in. It then moves on to show the desperation of would-be American immigrants fleeing from one land that doesn't want them to sneak into another. After watching this movie, you will definitely have a greater appreciation for what some immigrants have to go through.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3842,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2004-03-13","keywords":"united states,searching for father,texas,saigon,new york city","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Beautiful Country","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1924727065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3ZTI1NmYtYmEwNy00ZWJkLTk2NzYtNTFmODU1ZGJhY2JhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3ZTI1NmYtYmEwNy00ZWJkLTk2NzYtNTFmODU1ZGJhY2JhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1280613/","name":"Damien Nguyen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000499/","name":"Bai Ling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1336006/","name":"Dang Quoc Thinh Tran"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0596407/","name":"Hans Petter Moland"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010666/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0041459/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113606/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1182012/","name":"Sabina Murray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1600857/","name":"Lingard Jervey"}],"duration":"PT2H17M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fire Twister
Ogniste tornado
Fire Twister
programme.desc: Fire Twister: Directed by George Erschbamer. With Casper Van Dien, Lisa Davis, Johnny Hawkes, Leah Bateman. A man-made fire twister sweeps through Los Angeles, leaving the city in ruins. However, all is not lost when a group of strangers band together to put an end to the destruction." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3350436/","name":"Fire Twister","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM0NzExNDY0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTAzNzMwODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man-made fire twister sweeps through Los Angeles, leaving the city in ruins. However, all is not lost when a group of strangers band together to put an end to the destruction.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3350436/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Leofwine_draca"},"dateCreated":"2016-08-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"With that title, you know just what you're in for","reviewBody":"Another in an endless stream of cheap disaster movies filled with washed-up leading actors, nobody supporting actors, and lousy CGI. This one's got Casper Van Dien in it - no stranger to the genre having also appeared in 500 MPH STORM, which is pretty much interchangeable with this movie. The story is about a private company who devise a new and deadly form of fuel, which then gets caught up in a twister and refuses to be extinguished.\n\nAs with so many of these films, almost the entire running time consists of a central family who find themselves caught up in an almost sentient disaster which then proceeds to chase them all over the country. Shots of the fire twister chasing a jeep must take up at least half of the running time. The acting is wooden, the characters are made of cardboard, and the movie exudes cheapness from every poor. I love the over the top nature of the evil company which sends a machine-gun toting hit squad after any witnesses to this man-made catastrophe; totally over the top and cheesy with it. The only positive I can find to say about FIRE TWISTER is that the CGI effects aren't quite as terrible as is the norm for this genre.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":581,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":2.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-06-21","keywords":"disaster film,fugitive,hitman,sniper,tornado","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Fire Twister","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3334520601","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTRkYjg3NjAtNmI3Ny00MmJlLWJhMjUtYmU0MTNkYWE5ZTE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTRkYjg3NjAtNmI3Ny00MmJlLWJhMjUtYmU0MTNkYWE5ZTE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000680/","name":"Casper Van Dien"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2451535/","name":"Lisa Davis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1027228/","name":"Johnny Hawkes"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0259821/","name":"George Erschbamer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0319737/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0326282/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0047717/","name":"Larry Bain"}],"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Agent of Influence
Agent wpływu
Agent of Influence
programme.desc: Agent of Influence: Directed by Michel Poulette. With Christopher Plummer, Marina Orsini, Ted Whittall, Shaun Johnston. From Ian Adams' book of the same name, "Agent of Influence" is based on a real story of the intrigue surrounding the mysterious death of one of Canada's most accomplished foreign diplomats, John Watkins." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0307934/","name":"Agent of Influence","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTM2ZDMwYTgtNmM5Mi00NWI5LWExOTQtMzQ0YjI0YTA2ZDliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTk5MjAyMjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"From Ian Adams' book of the same name, "Agent of Influence" is based on a real story of the intrigue surrounding the mysterious death of one of Canada's most accomplished foreign diplomats, John Watkins.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0307934/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Uriah43"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"An Ambassador in a Compromised Position","reviewBody":"Loosely based on a true story, this film revolves around a man by the name of "John Watkins" (Christopher Plummer) who was a close and trusted friend of the Canadian Prime Minister. As such, he was given a position as the ambassador to the Soviet Union and from all accounts performed quite well. However, when some compromising information became available that implicated him in a possible blackmail scheme by the Soviets for a homosexual affair, he was quickly apprehended by the Royal Canadian Mounted Police and interrogated. What follows in this film is a possible narrative of the events during his interrogation which have certain sinister overtones that may-or may not-be credible. Now, rather than reveal any more and risk potentially ruining the film for those who haven't seen it, I will just say that after reading the account of this incident it is quite possible that the events depicted in this movie are somewhat embellished to provide for a better story than would have been obtained otherwise. Regardless, as far as this picture is concerned, there really wasn't that much action or suspense but Christopher Plummer performed adequately enough to maintain my interest for the most part and because of that I have rated this film accordingly. Average.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":321,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"genre":["Crime","Drama"],"keywords":"cia central intelligence agency,cold war,espionage,canadian soviet relations,canadian russian relations","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001626/","name":"Christopher Plummer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0650739/","name":"Marina Orsini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0926471/","name":"Ted Whittall"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0693599/","name":"Michel Poulette"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0231796/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005842/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0160942/","name":"Ken Chubb"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0011021/","name":"Ian Adams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1135065/","name":"Riley Adams"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

As such, he was given a position as the ambassador to the Soviet Union and from all accounts performed quite well. However, when some compromising information became available that implicated him in a possible blackmail scheme by the Soviets for a homosexual affair, he was quickly apprehended by the Royal Canadian Mounted Police and interrogated. What follows in this film is a possible narrative of the events during his interrogation which have certain sinister overtones that may-or may not-be credible. Now, rather than reveal any more and risk potentially ruining the film for those who haven't seen it, I will just say that after reading the account of this incident it is quite possible that the events depicted in this movie are somewhat embellished to provide for a better story than would have been obtained otherwise. Regardless, as far as this picture is concerned, there really wasn't that much action or suspense but Christopher Plummer performed adequately enough to maintain my interest for the most part and because of that I have rated this film accordingly. programme.title: Aces 'N' Eights
Zabójcza rozgrywka
Aces 'N Eights
programme.desc:
Aces 'N' Eights: Directed by Craig R. Baxley. With Casper Van Dien, Bruce Boxleitner, Ernest Borgnine, Jeff Kober. Already taking a gamble settling in the uncharted west, the peaceful settlers of a town destined for railroad greatness suddenly find themselves being ruthlessly gunned down. With no law and order to be found, justice falls onto the shoulders of an elderly rancher and an accomplished, but retired, gunslinger." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1087828/","name":"Aces 'N' Eights","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMzAyNjQxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzE2MTIzMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Already taking a gamble settling in the uncharted west, the peaceful settlers of a town destined for railroad greatness suddenly find themselves being ruthlessly gunned down. With no law and order to be found, justice falls onto the ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1087828/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vitaleralphlouis"},"dateCreated":"2008-10-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Startlingly Stupid Western Disappoints!","reviewBody":"We love westerns and wish there were more of them; but this one was made by people who lack the good sense of a goat.

The story has been told a hundred times about the brave ranchers and settlers trying to hold out against an abusive takeover of their land at unfair compensation. Almost all previous movies were better than this sorry mess. The story is absolutely ruined by the emptyheadedness of today's talent-free film-makers -- who refuse to learn anything from the greats of yesteryear.

To begin with, the picture substitutes excessive violence in place of a good story. The story is actually a muddled mess at best. They use all of the born-stupid techniques that spoil so many recent pictures: bad photography, dreadful editing, wrong-headed camera shots, and one of the new computer-generated musical scores that never ceases to annoy -- and never lets up. Music is supposed to enhance the action, not detract from it.

If you love westerns, skip this stinker. Perhaps Genius Pictures which made it will fade away.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":738,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-03-15","keywords":"rancher,railroad,main character shot,torture,opening action scene","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Aces 'N Eights","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi179634457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5MzYwODYtZGJkMi00NGQ3LWI3NTAtZTJmNjc0ZDlhOTYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5MzYwODYtZGJkMi00NGQ3LWI3NTAtZTJmNjc0ZDlhOTYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Grand Army"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000680/","name":"Casper Van Dien"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000310/","name":"Bruce Boxleitner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000308/","name":"Ernest Borgnine"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0062644/","name":"Craig R. Shuang Biao
programme.desc:
Twin Daggers: Directed by Kun-Hou Chen. With Rhett Giles, Coco Su, Veronica Bero, Joey Covington. A famous L.A. hitman falls in love with his target." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1266149/","name":"Twin Daggers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk0MDU4NDE2M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzE3MjA2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A famous L.A. hitman falls in love with his target.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1266149/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"verseczy"},"dateCreated":"2008-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Perhaps Richard Roeper's Kind Of Martial Arts Movie","reviewBody":"Warning all martial arts movie fans: Don't watch this! I wish there was a review or a clue to prevent me from renting this atrocity. I promised myself, I will not rate any movie with 1 out of 10, simply because somebody put time and effort into realization of such, and that alone deserves rating 2.

However how can you justify so much standing, sitting, dancing around in any movie let alone in martial arts or self proclaimed action film. Add to that: horrific acting, stupid script, terrible sound, fight scenes so hilarious for a good while I thought I'm watching a spoof, and editing at accelerated speed to cover up protagonists clumsiness in fighting skills. If they were to use any famous doubles you wouldn't had have hard time to recognize them at all.

I can only recommend this movie to Richard Roeper on the fact that he gave Ong Bak a thumb down in Ebert & Roeper at the Movies with reasoning that there was only 7 minutes of plot in excess to action. Well, Happy Birthday Richard, here is THE movie for you: Twin Daggers! All you can consume buffet of fable, followed by lengthy abeyance, to finish off with just a dash of engagement.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":296,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action"],"datePublished":"2008-07-22","keywords":"hitman,violence,martial arts","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1065316/","name":"Rhett Giles"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3080460/","name":"Coco Su"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1157242/","name":"Veronica Bero"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0155292/","name":"Kun-Hou Chen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078389/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065443/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139852/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11888805/","name":"Allen Shan"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: First Blood
Rambo: Pierwsza krew
First Blood
programme.desc: First Blood: Directed by Ted Kotcheff. With Sylvester Stallone, Richard Crenna, Brian Dennehy, Bill McKinney. A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0083944/","name":"First Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODBmOWU2YWMtZGUzZi00YzRhLWJjNDAtYTUwNWVkNDcyZmU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0083944/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CalRhys"},"dateCreated":"2014-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Mesmerising Action Masterpiece","reviewBody":"The ultimate action film and the ultimate psychological thriller! 'First Blood' was among others like 'Die Hard' as being one of the first action films I saw when I was younger, I even owned it on VHS. This film has Sly showing off his acting ability (which is saying something for an actor with such little capability of "acting") as the iconic John Rambo in the film that sparked off the eponymous film franchise, whilst the sequels were heavily classified as flops, 'First Blood' is a daring and thrilling survival adventure that follows a Vietnam Vet and the post-war trauma he suffers from. A dark yet sensitive film that follows one of the great action stars as he fights to survive, a mesmerising action masterpiece."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":238724,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"1982-10-22","keywords":"abuse of power,corrupt sheriff,veteran,corrupt cop,bad cop","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Rambo: First Blood","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1402863897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkY2FhOTgtODAzZi00YzUyLTk5ZWMtODZiNTM0YWI2MDhlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkY2FhOTgtODAzZi00YzUyLTk5ZWMtODZiNTM0YWI2MDhlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Artisan"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001133/","name":"Brian Dennehy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001077/","name":"Richard Crenna"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467646/","name":"Ted Kotcheff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055376/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0779514/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0231747/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0606251/","name":"David Morrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0468997/","name":"Michael Kozoll"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0755266/","name":"William Sackheim"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Sensored
Sensored
programme.desc: Sensored: Directed by Ryan Todd. With Robert Picardo, Sarah Knowlton, Brian Rife, Michelle Page. A children's book illustrator inhabits a twilight world of shifting reality and illusion, where cruelty and rampant evil do battle with his better instincts, and sanity is a question of perception." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1204966/","name":"Sensored","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NjAzNDA4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDY4NTE3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A children's book illustrator inhabits a twilight world of shifting reality and illusion, where cruelty and rampant evil do battle with his better instincts, and sanity is a question of perception.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1204966/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Leofwine_draca"},"dateCreated":"2016-02-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"It had potential, but it goes nowhere","reviewBody":"What an uneventful little film this was. I admit that the plot description makes it sound interesting, but in execution it's just yet another 'torture porn' spin-off from either SAW or HOSTEL, featuring people being tied up and tortured by a psycho. You have to feel for former STAR TREK actor Robert Picardo, being caught up in such a cheap and uneventful movie.\n\nI do enjoy B-movies as long as they're interesting, but SENSORED never is. The whole story is told in flashback with a twist or two that will be obvious from the outset. It's dim, murky, and exceptionally non-entertaining, with half the soundtrack just consisting of people screaming throughout. You just don't care about the characters despite the twists and turns of the plotting, which makes this a chore to sit through.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":359,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Horror","Thriller"],"keywords":"woman in jeopardy,water torture,black panties,black bra,torture","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000585/","name":"Robert Picardo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461587/","name":"Sarah Knowlton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2033389/","name":"Brian Rife"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1669506/","name":"Ryan Todd"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0151107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0281678/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1905331/","name":"Kevin Haskin"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Quiet
W ciszy
The Quiet
programme.desc: The Quiet: Directed by Jamie Babbit. With Elisha Cuthbert, Camilla Belle, Edie Falco, Martin Donovan. Following the unexpected death of her father, a deaf teenager moves in with her godparents, where she discovers the cruel behaviour of their daughter may be indicative of a dark secret within the family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0414951/","name":"The Quiet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4NDA4NDIyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDM5OTQzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Following the unexpected death of her father, a deaf teenager moves in with her godparents, where she discovers the cruel behaviour of their daughter may be indicative of a dark secret within the family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0414951/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"trev89"},"dateCreated":"2006-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Offbeat Award","reviewBody":"This film is very different from everything else out there, which is one reason why it has gotten so much attention here on IMDb. Some love it, some hate it, just like every movie. The subject matter is not the most appealing to the public, but I think that it gives the movie character. Looking back I can see many of the things that should have been changed, but the movie is a break out. A different type of movie, it is so different than everything else out there. It is original, and out-there.\n\nWhen watching this film you MUST be open-minded. Do not look at any of the negative reviews and watch the movie fresh of mind. If you know everything that is going to happen it makes it less entertaining too. If you have no clue what the movie was about I think it also gives it that much more of a sharper edge.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16284,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2005-09-12","keywords":"blonde,topless female nudity,voyeur,voyeurism,dysfunctional family","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Quiet","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi452526361","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjE2MGU0NWItYjk2MS00OGE1LWJhOGEtMWUxNDcyNzUwZjc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjE2MGU0NWItYjk2MS00OGE1LWJhOGEtMWUxNDcyNzUwZjc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004741/","name":"Camilla Belle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193846/","name":"Elisha Cuthbert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004908/","name":"Edie Falco"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0044803/","name":"Jamie Babbit"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186897/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0126219/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186711/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1459623/","name":"Abdi Nazemian"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1460116/","name":"Micah Schraft"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

A Christmastime drama centered around the Whitfield family's first holiday together in four years." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0937375/","name":"This Christmas","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE0NDY5Mzk2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzI3MDM4._V1_.jpg","description":"A Christmastime drama centered around the Whitfield family's first holiday together in four years.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0937375/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"justlikegrandma"},"dateCreated":"2007-12-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"A New Christmas Favorite","reviewBody":"I thoroughly enjoyed this movie! I watched this movie expecting it to be another movie making fun of us but instead I found it to be an enjoyable movie. I love the way it each character had real issues and real conflicts that affect real families. Regina King, as always, did an excellent job portraying a woman scorn that has had enough. This movie cannot be compared to any other movie out there because it offers something for everyone without nudity. Surely, everyone who watches this movie can relate it to themselves or someone in their family. Chris Brown rocked singing "This Christmas." He takes 2nd place with this song only to the original singer, Donny Hathaway. programme.title: The Tourist
Turysta
The Tourist
programme.desc: The Tourist: Directed by Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck. With Johnny Depp, Angelina Jolie, Paul Bettany, Timothy Dalton. Revolves around Frank, an American tourist visiting Italy to mend a broken heart. Elise is an extraordinary woman who deliberately crosses his path." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1243957/","name":"The Tourist","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyMzc3OTkwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjc0MTgwNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around Frank, an American tourist visiting Italy to mend a broken heart. Elise is an extraordinary woman who deliberately crosses his path.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1243957/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dayXexists"},"dateCreated":"2011-01-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Unfairly bashed by the critics- The Tourist is a fun, throwback caper","reviewBody":"The critics are completely off base with their treatment of The Tourist.\n\nWas this trying to be an Oscar contender? Absolutely not. So why was it reviewed like it was? I thought Johnny and Angelina were perfectly fine and even charming in their roles. I didn't find the film to drag at all and actually thought it was an entertaining and engrossing story that moved along at a good pace. Jolie is the most stunningly beautiful actress of this era and her beauty is even more magnified with the Venice backdrop. Yes if I had it my way, based on my personal tastes, I would have preferred a more serious thriller in the vein of Taken. Because of the tone of the movie I was never really concerned for the welfare of the characters. But it was the film makers' decision to make this lighter fare and it still worked on that level. I thought the subtle comedy in here was actually quite funny and sarcastic in a way and so did the other people in the audience. I know a lot of people complained about the predictable twist at the end but I can't comment on that as a couple of the reviews I read prior to seeing this pretty much gave that away. I will say though that I was more surprised with the twist concerning Elise, Jolie's character. My only real complaint is the score, I thought it got in the way at times and was a little too "sappy fairy tale" if you can understand that. Overall I think this was a fun, harmless throwback crime caper and really, a bit of a modern spoof on the genre. I loved the cheeky line at the end-- was that a wink at Depp's less than perfect looks in this movie? B+","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":233098,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2010-12-08","keywords":"tailing a suspect,russophobia,surveillance van,police surveillance,venice italy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Tourist: TV Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi304847129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEyMDk3MDY0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjE2OTg5Mw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEyMDk3MDY0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjE2OTg5Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Frank Taylor (Depp) travels to Venice to recover from a recent break-up, though he soon finds himself engaged by the beautiful and mysterious Elise (Jolie) -- who happens to be an Interpol agent with a dangerous connection to a fugitive criminal."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000136/","name":"Johnny Depp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0079273/","name":"Paul Bettany"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003697/","name":"Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209646/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031181/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003697/","name":"Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003160/","name":"Christopher McQuarrie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0271501/","name":"Julian Fellowes"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Flatliners
Linia życia
Flatliners
programme.desc:
Flatliners: Directed by Joel Schumacher. With Kiefer Sutherland, Julia Roberts, Kevin Bacon, William Baldwin. Five medical students experiment with "near death" experiences, until the dark consequences of past tragedies begin to jeopardize their lives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0099582/","name":"Flatliners","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3MDE3NTM3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzgwNTg4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Five medical students experiment with "near death" experiences, until the dark consequences of past tragedies begin to jeopardize their lives.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0099582/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CihanVercan"},"dateCreated":"2009-10-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Flatliners builds a Suspension Bridge between Life and Death, then starts walking on it","reviewBody":"Countless TV displays and the memorable appearances from 4 of today's mega-stars(plus Hope Davis's screen debut) keep Flatliners still in prudence. The plot is about a non-academic research of five medicine undergrads pursuing one's crazy idea on discovering the secret of death, and learn what's after death, then come back to life again. Yet the storyline hasn't been designed as fascinating as the idea of the plot.

There are popular stereotypes to develop a regular teen-slasher script in Flatliners. There is Nelson who creates the idea of decoding death, pretty but introverted Rachel, David who cuts the Gordian knot on luckily not to be dismissed from the school, ladies' man Joe and finally the smart guy Randy("I did not come to medical school to murder my class mates no matter how deranged they might be"). They join hands altogether in an experiment where Nelson's heart will be stopped and rerythmed. Then they decide to continue this experiment in strict confidence at night times in the campus. Not long after Nelson's experience everyone starts a race over having the wildest and the longest death experience, risking their lives one by one. Yet, soon they realize their daily life becomes affected from those experiences they had. The visits to the afterlife brings back their delinquent feelings from their childhood memories. Depolarizing their deep subconscious watchfulness, they begin having somatic delusions and visual hallucinations.

When the point comes where the explanation of subconscious, director Joel Schumacher skips that every humankind has a subconscious personality which they are not aware of. This inner personality keeps one from altering into identity loss. If you lose or if you depolarize this subconscious personality you certainly lose your identity instead of refreshing childhood memories. I wanted to add this as a movie mistake, which already has been mentioned via movie critics in the earlier 90s'. Obviously here in this movie Schumacher made the actors have it least affected. Then why do they hesitate continuing on the experiment after learning their lesson, as if death is designed indiscoverable by God? David had been introduced as an Atheist, now he turned out to believe in God when he recalled a flashback from his childhood. After witnessing this 180 degreed change in David, it's clear to see that Schumacher's film was so conservative and lily-livered; that's ultimately why it's never classified as a work of science fiction. Alas! It had a good potential. It even tried to tell the unconscious maturation from having a death experience, beginning to believe that death is so simply natural and it's only a part of a human's life.

More than what's in the movie, it was also memorable to recall what's with the movie. Jan de Bont as the cinematographer, who had worked almost every time with Schumacher, creates an dreamy atmosphere like it's being an Gothic horror movie. The blue color schemes all over the walls reflecting into the actors' faces deliver first class of lighting, that suits perfectly with the film. The close-up shots of the gargoyle statues in the campus buildings, Catholic frescoes in the walls, stop-motion cameras, and the dynamic camera speeds were all belong to Bont's skills.

Flatliners became a cult movie in time with its sociological pen-portrait of the X-generation juvenile especially via its futuristic editing style with storyboard connection sequences like being part of a video music clip so much aesthetically. Those were the times where fast-paced and multi-sequenced video music clips were on rise. This style was very rare to come across in those years after its pioneer Tony Scott's "The Hunger(1983)".","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":83697,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1990-08-10","keywords":"near death experience,childhood trauma,voice message,stitching one's wound,photography","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000662/","name":"Kiefer Sutherland"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000102/","name":"Kevin Bacon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000210/","name":"Julia Roberts"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001708/","name":"Joel Schumacher"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014288/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0276823/","name":"Peter Filardi"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

There is Nelson who creates the idea of decoding death, pretty but introverted Rachel, David who cuts the Gordian knot on luckily not to be dismissed from the school, ladies' man Joe and finally the smart guy Randy("I did not come to medical school to murder my class mates no matter how deranged they might be"). They join hands altogether in an experiment where Nelson's heart will be stopped and rerythmed. Then they decide to continue this experiment in strict confidence at night times in the campus. Not long after Nelson's experience everyone starts a race over having the wildest and the longest death experience, risking their lives one by one. Yet, soon they realize their daily life becomes affected from those experiences they had. The visits to the afterlife brings back their delinquent feelings from their childhood memories. Depolarizing their deep subconscious watchfulness, they begin having somatic delusions and visual hallucinations.

When the point comes where the explanation of subconscious, director Joel Schumacher skips that every humankind has a subconscious personality which they are not aware of. This inner personality keeps one from altering into identity loss. If you lose or if you depolarize this subconscious personality you certainly lose your identity instead of refreshing childhood memories. I wanted to add this as a movie mistake, which already has been mentioned via movie critics in the earlier 90s'. Obviously here in this movie Schumacher made the actors have it least affected. Then why do they hesitate continuing on the experiment after learning their lesson, as if death is designed indiscoverable by God? David had been introduced as an Atheist, now he turned out to believe in God when he recalled a flashback from his childhood. After witnessing this 180 degreed change in David, it's clear to see that Schumacher's film was so conservative and lily-livered; that's ultimately why it's never classified as a work of science fiction. Alas! It had a good potential. It even tried to tell the unconscious maturation from having a death experience, beginning to believe that death is so simply natural and it's only a part of a human's life.

More than what's in the movie, it was also memorable to recall what's with the movie. Jan de Bont as the cinematographer, who had worked almost every time with Schumacher, creates an dreamy atmosphere like it's being an Gothic horror movie. The blue color schemes all over the walls reflecting into the actors' faces deliver first class of lighting, that suits perfectly with the film. The close-up shots of the gargoyle statues in the campus buildings, Catholic frescoes in the walls, stop-motion cameras, and the dynamic camera speeds were all belong to Bont's skills.

Flatliners became a cult movie in time with its sociological pen-portrait of the X-generation juvenile especially via its futuristic editing style with storyboard connection sequences like being part of a video music clip so much aesthetically. Those were the times where fast-paced and multi-sequenced video music clips were on rise. This style was very rare to come across in those years after its pioneer Tony Scott's "The Hunger(1983)".","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":83697,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1990-08-10","keywords":"near death experience,childhood trauma,voice message,stitching one's wound,photography","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000662/","name":"Kiefer Sutherland","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000102/","name":"Kevin Bacon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000210/","name":"Julia Roberts"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001708/","name":"Joel Schumacher"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014288/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0276823/","name":"Peter Filardi"],"duration":"PT1H55M"</script><metacontent="

Prison inmates form a football team to challenge the prison guards." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0398165/","name":"The Longest Yard","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NTQyNDk2NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTE2OTQzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Prison inmates form a football team to challenge the prison guards.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0398165/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kennethcoker1982-1"},"dateCreated":"2005-06-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Take it for a stand alone movie..","reviewBody":"Don't compare today's comedy version of "The Longest Yard" to the old with Burt Reynolds. Today's is good and effective for what it is, a comedy film with a bit of action interlaced. So many classic Hollywood films were so good, that any attempt at a remake is just going to fall flat on its face. The Longest Yard with Adam Sandler is more of today's take on the story if you asked me. It has humor, and is Sandler at his best with Chris Rock playing his role well too. Critics and classic moviegoers beware. Unless you are open-minded, you will never find the hidden treasures of the movie world. It's a football comedy, plain and simple.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":169833,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Sport"],"datePublished":"2005-08-10","keywords":"frame up,scantily clad female,voyeur,voyeurism,football helmet","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Longest Yard","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi821428505","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzRlYmJmYjgtMTFmMy00NDg4LTlmYTYtMjJhMzFiMDU3ZjYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzRlYmJmYjgtMTFmMy00NDg4LTlmYTYtMjJhMzFiMDU3ZjYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Paramount Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001191/","name":"Adam Sandler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000608/","name":"Burt Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001674/","name":"Chris Rock"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781842/","name":"Peter Segal"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059609/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0748665/","name":"Albert S. programme.title: The Art of War
Zasady walki
The Art of War
programme.desc:
The Art of War: Directed by Christian Duguay. With Wesley Snipes, Anne Archer, Maury Chaykin, Marie Matiko. UN's secretary general uses covert operations to help diplomacy along. Shaw's called back 6 months after one such operation. He witnesses the murder of Chinese UN ambassador at UN, NYC, chases the assassin and ends up a suspect." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0160009/","name":"The Art of War","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzAyMjE2MDI3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNTIwMzg2._V1_.jpg","description":"UN's secretary general uses covert operations to help diplomacy along. Shaw's called back 6 months after one such operation. He witnesses the murder of Chinese UN ambassador at UN, NYC, chases the assassin and ends up a suspect.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0160009/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lastliberal"},"dateCreated":"2007-04-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good thriller - lots of action","reviewBody":"First off the technical aspects of this movie were superior in every sense. The sound, the editing, the camera work, all of it was fantastic and made this an enjoyable treat.

You have to enjoy all that because, with the exception of Donald Sutherland who is always on, the acting isn't there. Wesley Snipes is one of my favorite actions heroes, but we all know that action heroes can't act. Well, maybe Bruce Willis is the exception. But for an action hero, Wesley is great and does a great job here - for an action hero.

And, hey, Marie Matiko was easy on the eyes.

If you liked Enemy of the State, you will like this movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":29483,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2000-08-25","keywords":"hero murders a woman,nude wears eyeglasses,fbi federal bureau of investigation,motor vehicle,car","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Art of War","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1820918041","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2VhZjllMDUtODkzYi00NTc0LTg0YTctMTFjNTljY2ZiYWVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2VhZjllMDUtODkzYi00NTc0LTg0YTctMTFjNTljY2ZiYWVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000648/","name":"Wesley Snipes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000271/","name":"Anne Archer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001999/","name":"Maury Chaykin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240995/","name":"Christian Duguay"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033472/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043393/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078451/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0063511/","name":"Wayne Beach"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058164/","name":"Simon Barry"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

He witnesses the murder of Chinese UN ambassador at UN, NYC, chases the assassin and ends up a suspect.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0160009/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"lastliberal","dateCreated":"2007-04-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good thriller - lots of action","reviewBody":"First off the technical aspects of this movie were superior in every sense. The sound, the editing, the camera work, all of it was fantastic and made this an enjoyable treat.

You have to enjoy all that because, with the exception of Donald Sutherland who is always on, the acting isn't there. Wesley Snipes is one of my favorite actions heroes, but we all know that action heroes can't act. Well, maybe Bruce Willis is the exception. But for an action hero, Wesley is great and does a great job here - for an action hero.

And, hey, Marie Matiko was easy on the eyes.

If you liked Enemy of the State, you will like this movie.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":29483,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2000-08-25","keywords":"hero murders a woman,nude wears eyeglasses,fbi federal bureau of investigation,motor vehicle,car","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Art of War","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1820918041","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2VhZjllMDUtODkzYi00NTc0LTg0YTctMTFjNTljY2ZiYWVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2VhZjllMDUtODkzYi00NTc0LTg0YTctMTFjNTljY2ZiYWVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000648/","name":"Wesley Snipes","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000271/","name":"Anne Archer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001999/","name":"Maury Chaykin"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240995/","name":"Christian Duguay"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033472/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043393/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078451/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0063511/","name":"Wayne Beach","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058164/","name":"Simon Barry"],"duration":"PT1H57M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
Jumanji: Przygoda w dżungli
Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc:
Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle: Directed by Jake Kasdan. With Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart, Jack Black, Karen Gillan. Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2283362/","name":"Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQ0NDhjYWItYTMxZi00NTk2LWIzNDEtOWZiYWYxZjc2MTgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2283362/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Jack_C_"},"dateCreated":"2017-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well done","reviewBody":"We were pleasantly surprised with the quality of this remake. The jokes are nonstop and witty. Characters are well fleshed out with each person playing a physical opposite of their persona outside of Jumanji. A little homage is paid to Alan Parrish at the beginning of the movie, and the movie continues, 20 years after the events of 1996.

The Rock is always fun, but shines as a scared nerd with no confidence. Karen Gillan is adorable as the socially awkward nerdy girl. Jack Black playing a self obsessed popular girl is laugh out loud funny. Kevin Hart as a shrunken jock with many assigned weaknesses is classic. 

All in all a nearly perfect family comedy that rises above lowest common denominator humor. Worth the trip to see it on the big screen. You do not have to see the original to appreciate it. Not quite 10 stars because adult re-watch value is just not there.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":346238,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2017-12-20","keywords":"jungle,trapped in a game,title based on song,song in title,high school","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3413817625","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODUxNzE5MDI1NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTAwNzE2MzI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODUxNzE5MDI1NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTAwNzE2MzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four teenagers discover an old video game console and are literally drawn into the game's jungle setting becoming the adult avatars they choose."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2394794/","name":"Karen Gillan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0366389/","name":"Kevin Hart"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440458/","name":"Jake Kasdan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0332017/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023815/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0571344/","name":"Chris McKenna"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1273099/","name":"Erik Sommers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003298/","name":"Scott Rosenberg"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Rundown
Witajcie w dżungli
The Rundown
programme.desc:
The Rundown: Directed by Peter Berg. With Dwayne Johnson, Seann William Scott, Rosario Dawson, Christopher Walken. A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0327850/","name":"The Rundown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWU3ZDYxZjMtZmYyOS00NWQyLTk1MmItNDg4ZWM2ZGQxOTNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0327850/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1"},"dateCreated":"2007-01-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Put Your Brain On Hold & Enjoy The Stylish, Wild Ride","reviewBody":"Yup, this is way hokey and one of the dumbest movies I own in my collection, yet it's very likable and mostly a fun film with great style and scenery.

An adventure story, played strictly for entertainment value, it mostly succeeds because Dwayne Johnson, better known as "The Rock," is a very likable hero. He's clean-cut, well-spoken, modest, etc. Supposedly this film was supposed to be The Rock grabbing the action mantle, so to speak, from the king - Arnold Schwarzenegger - who will no longer make movies. They even have Arnie make a quick cameo, wishing The Rock good luck! That was a good touch.

Meanwhile, Rock's cohort in this film, Seann William Scott, gets by with his sense of humor. It almost plays like one of these "buddy movies" except that these two guys ("Beck" and "Travis," respectively) are not on the same page about anything. In no other film can I recall two characters getting beat up and annihilated like these two guys....but they never seem the worse for wear! Unbelievable!

Rosario Dawson adds some female sex appeal and Christopher Walken adds his normal entertaining take on being the villain. His dialog was very good in here. 

I didn't realize until the second time I watched it (which is where I stand now) just how stylishly this was filmed. This movie reminded me of many made by either Robert Rodriguez or Quentin Taranatino with the gimmick photography. It makes it all the more fun to watch. IMDb data; ttnr: 0327850, Title: The Rundown, --- Description: The Rundown: Directed by Peter Berg. With Dwayne Johnson, Seann William Scott, Rosario Dawson, Christopher Walken. A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0327850/","name":"The Rundown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWU3ZDYxZjMtZmYyOS00NWQyLTk1MmItNDg4ZWM2ZGQxOTNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0327850/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1","dateCreated":"2007-01-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Put Your Brain On Hold & Enjoy The Stylish, Wild Ride","reviewBody":"Yup, this is way hokey and one of the dumbest movies I own in my collection, yet it's very likable and mostly a fun film with great style and scenery.

An adventure story, played strictly for entertainment value, it mostly succeeds because Dwayne Johnson, better known as "The Rock," is a very likable hero. He's clean-cut, well-spoken, modest, etc. Supposedly this film was supposed to be The Rock grabbing the action mantle, so to speak, from the king - Arnold Schwarzenegger - who will no longer make movies. They even have Arnie make a quick cameo, wishing The Rock good luck! That was a good touch.

Meanwhile, Rock's cohort in this film, Seann William Scott, gets by with his sense of humor. It almost plays like one of these "buddy movies" except that these two guys ("Beck" and "Travis," respectively) are not on the same page about anything. In no other film can I recall two characters getting beat up and annihilated like these two guys....but they never seem the worse for wear! Unbelievable!

Rosario Dawson adds some female sex appeal and Christopher Walken adds his normal entertaining take on being the villain. His dialog was very good in here. 

I didn't realize until the second time I watched it (which is where I stand now) just how stylishly this was filmed. This movie reminded me of many made by either Robert Rodriguez or Quentin Taranatino with the gimmick photography. It makes it all the more fun to watch. Add some excellent sound, tremendous Hawaiian scenery simulated to look the the Amazon jungle in Brazil......and you can put up with the stupidness of the story and have a good time.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":104362,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2004-03-17","keywords":"jungle,bounty hunter,brazil,gold mine,buddy","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Rundown","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2038871577","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4MDY4Mzg1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTg4MTUyMDI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4MDY4Mzg1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTg4MTUyMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Rundown","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005405/","name":"Seann William Scott","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000686/","name":"Christopher Walken"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000916/","name":"Peter Berg"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242604/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0829739/","name":"R.J. Vampire death dealer Selene (Kate Beckinsale) fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3717252/","name":"Underworld: Blood Wars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5Njk0NTIyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjU4MjY5MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Vampire death dealer Selene (Kate Beckinsale) fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3717252/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tuanskie"},"dateCreated":"2017-04-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just take it as entertainment","reviewBody":"It's Kate Beckinsale again in tight leather! Come on people, pop in the Blu-Ray or stream it and load up the popcorn. Take off the critic's thinking cap for a night. Don't expect too much with a sophisticated plot or story line. programme.desc:
2012: Directed by Roland Emmerich. With John Cusack, Amanda Peet, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Thandiwe Newton. A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1190080/","name":"2012","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0MjEyODQzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTczMjQ4Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1190080/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cpbadgeman"},"dateCreated":"2009-11-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great campy fun","reviewBody":"It was pretty much inevitable that someone would make a movie based on all the 2012 hoopla. Nor is it surprising when that someone is disaster maven Roland Emmerich. His latest effort adheres closely to the formula established by his earlier films "Independence Day" and "The Day After Tomorrow"- in other words we get to watch a typically flawed-but-lovable American family (headed by John Cusack and Amanda Peet), along with a range of supporting characters, attempt to survive the end of the world.

That's all there is to the basic plot. The real stars of the film are the truly spectacular special effects. Emmerich really pulls out all the stops and creates some truly awesome set-pieces of destruction. In order to ensure that the main characters have endless perilous situations to escape from, we get to see a bunch of natural and man-made wonders get totaled by Mama Nature. Highlights include Los Angeles falling into the sea, Las Vegas being swallowed by the desert, and the Himalayas being submerged by tidal waves.

Improbable? Definitely. Ridiculous? You bet. But none of that matters since "2012" is exactly the film it was intended to be- a great big popcorn movie that offers big laughs, big thrills, and a lot of good old fashioned fun.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":364535,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-11-11","keywords":"apocalypse,earthquake,end of the world,elizabeth i character,juvenile bedwetting","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"2012: Final Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3444113945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk0NDQ4MjE5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgzMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk0NDQ4MjE5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgzMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An academic researcher leads a group of people in a fight to counteract the apocalyptic events that were predicted by the ancient Mayan calendar. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000131/","name":"John Cusack"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0628601/","name":"Thandiwe Newton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0252230/","name":"Chiwetel Ejiofor"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247168/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460057/","name":"Harald Kloser"}],"duration":"PT2H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Battle: Los Angeles: Directed by Jonathan Liebesman. With Aaron Eckhart, Ramon Rodriguez, Will Rothhaar, Cory Hardrict.
